Subject: Heritrix job definition

I just started to read the Heritrix documentation.

Is it assumed that each Heritrix job has a start and
end, and that every URL is crawled only once within a job?
If so, maybe this should be explained early in the
documentation, because I don't think it is now.

Other web crawlers (such as those for search engines)
will continuously revisit all URLs (within their scope)
and try to fetch those URLs more often where the
content is more frequently updated. Is this a mode of
operation that is not available in Heritrix?


-- 
  Lars Aronsson (lars@...)
  Aronsson Datateknik - http://aronsson.se
